content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case involves the division of inheritance and the sale of a property one party has the option to propose sales agencies or private buyers another party mr c has agreed to use the property and pay rent until may 31 2017 if the property is sold before that date mr c must vacate the property once the sale is completed mr c must also pay the coheirs an occupancy allowance the mediation process began with the appointment of a mediator and the filing of a petition the parties involved had several meetings and reached an agreement on the sale of the property the mediation costs amounted to €120313 the proceedings were closed on october 14 2016 in naples
